headline: Is Kinder Morgan (KMI) Pricing In Its Pipeline Role Or Leaving A Margin Of Safety
summary: Wondering whether Kinder Morgan is good value at around US$27.27, or if most of the opportunity is already priced in? This article walks through the key numbers so you can judge that for yourself. Over the short term, the stock has been fairly steady, with a 0.8% decline over the last week, a 0.2% decline over the last month, and a 1.6% decline year to date, while the 1 year return sits at 0.6%. Looking further back, the 3 year return is 70.2% and the 5 year return is 133.2%. Recent news...
